```{r data generation, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
library(reticulate)
cf = sample(c(-5,-4,-3,-2,2,3,4,5),4)
a = round(cf[1])
b = round(cf[2])
c = round(cf[3])
d = round(cf[4])

qt = sample(1:3,1)
if(qt==1){
  an = -a
  bn = -b
  cn = -c
  dn = -d
  qex = "-f(x)"
  anst = "Multiply the whole expression by $(-1)$. This changes the sign of every term."
} else if(qt==2) {
  an = -a
  bn = b
  cn = -c
  dn = d
  qex = "f(-x)"
  anst = "Substitute $-x$ for $x$ and simplify. This changes the sign of the ODD powered terms."
} else {
  an = a
  bn = -b
  cn = c
  dn = -d
  qex = "-f(-x)"
  anst = "Substitute $-x$ for $x$, multiplify the whole expression by $(-1)$, and simplify. This changes the sign of the EVEN powered terms."
}
al = -5:5
al2 = character()
for(i in al){
  if(i<0){
    al2 = c(al2,paste0(i))
  } else {
    al2 = c(al2,paste0("+",i))
  }
}
ans1 = paste0(1*(al==an),collapse="")
ans2 = paste0(1*(al==bn),collapse="")
ans3 = paste0(1*(al==cn),collapse="")
ans4 = paste0(1*(al==dn),collapse="")
apast = paste0("* ",al,"\n",collapse="")
bpast = paste0("* ",al2,"\n",collapse="")
```
